title: Instead of saying "this is what girls would look like if they had realistic bodies..."

embed.description: Cheezburger.com - Crafted from the finest Internets.

body:
https://i.chzbgr.com/maxW500/8541587456/hBF697A66/

https://i.chzbgr.com/maxW500/8541590528/h8EF49788/

Why don't people just say **average/less-attractive** bodies? Because the bodies themselves seem fine.

It's like one commenter said, "_how bout you actually put some effort into looking better instead of trying to lower everyone's standards?_"

I get that not everyone is stacked with huge boobs, not much you can do about that naturally, but getting less fat is a simple case of proper diet and exercise.
